name: Summit Madness - Battle Royale
description:
Welcome to the 2k20 Worthless Summit. 

For security reasons, the heads of the most important states have gathered together on the summit of an unknown mountain to discuss.....stuff.

During the meeting, something went wrong and everybody has gone bananas!

You play as the leader of your country, attending to the 2k20 Worthless Summit. Your main goal is to throw from the summit of the mountain the other members. Beware though, the others are also thriving to survive.

There can only be one survivor!

Currently there is only one level. The player can improve his highscore by clearing the arena as quick as possible.

Controls are limited to WASD and the Arrow Keys

Arrows - Move
W - Jump
D - Grab
A - Throw
S - Escape

NOTE! This game was made in two days for the Mini Jam 52 with the theme "Summit" and the limitation to use only WASD and the Arrow Keys to navigate the menu and during gameplay.

NOTE2! If you encounter any gameplay bugs (can't grab/can't throw) just fall into the abyss and restart the level. Sorry for any inconvenience, I didn't have time to squish every little one of them.
